Verses: 1 abimelekkukkuppinbu, Thodhovin Maganaagiya Poovaavin Kumaaran Tholaa Ennum Isakkaar Koththiraththaan Isravelai Ratchikka Ezhumbinaan; Avan Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththu Ooraagiya Saameerile Kudiyirundhaan.
2 avan Isravelai Irubaththumoondru Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththu, Pinbu Mariththu, Saameerile Adakkampannappattaan.
3 avanukkuppinbu, Keeleyaaththiyanaana Yaaveer Ezhumbi, Isravelai Irubaththirandu Varusham Nyaayam Visaariththaan.

4 muppadhu Kazhudhaikkuttigalinmel Erum Muppadhu Kumaarar Avanukku Irundhaargal; Avargalukku Muppadhu Oorgalum Irundhadhu; Keeleyaa Dhesaththilirukkira Avaigalukku Innaalvaraikkum Yaaveerin Graamangalengira Per Irukkiradhu.

6 isravel Puththirar, Marupadiyum Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappu Seydhu, Karththarai Seviyaamal Avarai Vittup Poi, Paagaalgalaiyum, Astharoththaiyum, Seeriyaavin Dhevargalaiyum, Seedhonin Dhevargalaiyum, Movaabin Dhevargalaiyum, Ammon Puththirarin Dhevargalaiyum, Pelistharin Dhevargalaiyum Seviththaargal.
7 appozhudhu Karththar Isravelin Mel Kobamoondu, Avargalaip Pelisthar Kaiyilum, Ammon Puththirar Kaiyilum Vitruppottaar.
8 avargal Andha Varusham Mudharkondu Padhinettu Varushamaai Yordhaanukku Appaale Keeleyaaththilulla Emoriyarin Dhesaththil Irukkira Isravel Puththiraraiyellaam Nerukki Odukkinaargal.
9 ammon Puththirar Yoodhaavinmelum, Benyameenmelum, Eppiraayeem Kudumbaththaarmelum Yuththam Panna Yordhaanaik Kadandhuvandhaargal; Isravelar Migavum Nerukkappattaargal.
10 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokki Muraiyittu: Umakku Virodhamaagap Paavancheydhom; Naangal Engal Dhevanaivittu, Paagaalgalai Seviththom Endraargal.
11 karththar Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Egipthiyarum, Emoriyarum, Ammon Puththirarum, Pelisthiyarum,
12 seedhoniyarum, Amalekkiyarum, Maagoniyarum, Ungalai Odukkum Samayangalil, Neengal Ennai Nokki Muraiyittapodhu, Naan Ungalai Avargal Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchikkavillaiyaa?
13 appadiyirundhum Neengal Ennai Vittu, Anniya Dhevargalai Seviththeergal; Aagaiyaal Ini Ungalai Ratchiyen.
14 neengal Poi, Ungalukkaagath Therindhukonda Dhevargalai Nokki Muraiyidungal; Avaigal Ungal Aabaththin Kaalaththil Ungalai Ratchikkattum Endraar.
15 isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokki: Paavancheydhom, Dhevareer Ummudaiya Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhai Engalukku Seyyum; Indraikkumaaththiram Engalai Ratchiththarulum Endru Solli,
16 anniya Dhevargalaith Thangal Naduvilirundhu Vilakkivittu, Karththarukku Aaraadhanai Seydhaargal; Appozhudhu Avar Isravelin Varuththaththaip Paarththu Manadhuruginaar.
17 ammon Puththirar Koottankoodi, Keeleyaaththile Paalayamiranginaargal; Isravel Puththirarum Koodikkondu, Mispaavile Paalayamiranginaargal.

18 appozhudhu Keeleyaaththinjanangalum Prabukkalum Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Ammon Puththirarmel Mundhi Yuththampannappogira Manushan Yaar? Avane Keeleyaaththinkudigalukkellaam Thalaivanaayiruppaan Endraargal.
